akn:content.akn:p: “Commissioner” means the Commissioner of the Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking.
“Community health reinvestment” means expenditures that promote and safeguard the public health or that benefit current or future subscribers, including premium rate reductions.
“Contractholder” means a person entering into a subscriber contract with a corporation.

“Corporation” means a nonstock, nonprofit corporation which is subject to regulation and licensing under this chapter and which offers subscriber contracts as part of a hospital service plan, a medical service plan, or both.
“Domestic corporation” means a corporation organized under the laws of the District, or formed or organized under an act of Congress.
“Healthy DC and Health Care Expansion Fund” means the Healthy DC and Health Care Expansion Fund established by § 31-3514.02.

“Hospital service plan” means a plan for providing hospital and related services by hospitals and others which entitles a subscriber to certain hospital and related services, or to benefits and indemnification for such services.
“Mayor” means the Mayor of the District of Columbia or the Mayor’s designated agent.

“Medical service plan” means a plan for providing medical services and related services by physicians and others which entitles a subscriber to certain medical and related services, or to benefits and indemnification for such services.
“Plan” means a hospital service plan, a medical service plan, or a combination of the two.

“Public-private partnership” means a mutually acceptable written agreement between the Mayor and a hospital and medical services corporation that is certified by the Commissioner upon the execution and delivery of the agreement by the parties and which agreement:
“RS Fund” means the rate stabilization fund established by § 31-3514(j).
“Subscriber” means any person entitled to benefits under the terms and conditions of a subscriber contract.

“Subscriber contract” means a written group or individual contract which is issued to a contractholder by a corporation which provides for subscriber participation in a hospital service plan, a medical service plan, or a combination of the two.
“Subsidiary” means an affiliate controlled by a corporation directly or indirectly through 1 or more intermediaries.
“Surplus” means the amount by which all admitted assets of the corporation exceed its liabilities, inclusive of the reserves required pursuant to § 31-3509.
